_sText:
______________________________________________________________
=========================ZM_SAXON=============================
______________________________________________________________


A massively egotistical map created by Alex Voysey (AKA Saxon).
I've worked hard to make an attractive and well balanced map, with its own unique style.  

I was hoping to add custom weapons to the map, but sadly this hasn't been possible.  Instead I've added some map specific player skins, which is nevertheless a first for CSS!

I'm currently planning on creating a ZE version of this map - if anyone can provide an Atix style helicopter prefab, this will be done!


CREDITS:
Map, sound effects, model rigging by Alex Voysey
Many thanks to ROY[NL] for making the elevator prefab!

Models by Valve, edited by Alex Voysey.


Installation:
Extract the BSP file to your cstrike/maps folder.

___________________________________________________
===================================================
___________________________________________________

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Be sure that your server runs with SV_CONSISTENCY 0
Without this the map will not load!
